lines: Slowly put my feet on the ground
But it all, comes back again
But it all, comes back again
Or the dream of the wings on my shoulders
Will take me far, far away
To a land, a room, a day
Where I have all I need
A horse, to hold me high
But it all, comes back again
But it all, comes back again
And 7 something, where I used to belong
Begins at the tip of my toe
Looking back at what is gone
In every corner of my mind
Full of noise where I hide
On the wall I can not climb
It used to be all of us
And its still a lot of us
Raged and hurt for what we have done
We come pure and somehow we fuck it up
We took a blue ball of beauty
And made a huge scene of war
Is there any hope in this?
Forget it, maybe we should all just wrap it up.
The sense it used to make is gone
With every gob we spat in the faces we should have loved
Instead of taking care of what we shouldve taken care of
We laid in the bed and rubbed one out
Let us just forget about it
And wonder forever why we've been all just left behind
In a world destroyed by a god
We pray to him to save us all!
Son! you have a better chance if you talk to a wall
You'll hear yourself and you will believe in it
That we all are just one
And this is just a ride
And just fill up the sewers
To act around like selfish pricks
And not give a damn about no one around us, nothing around us
For one to have it all
And one to strive not to die
The way we all set this up
In between the sound Hide the strongest feelings
In between the sound Hide the deepest thoughts
In between the lies Theres a light believe me
In between the pain In between the lies Lies the truth
Longing for a scent We Pretend Theres no blame
Underneath the mask Underneath your fear Both of us are breaking
Underneath the mask Underneath my fear Both of us are stronger
Underneath the skin Underneath the puls Where the lust is breathing
Underneath the skin Underneath the puls Theres a sea
Longing for a scent We Pretend Theres no blame
As it goes on and far
Turns harder to get a grasp of
Parade of nightmares under my bed
Im at the bottom of this hole
You never heard what I said
It will go the way it began
They just rang the bell and we ran
And I hold on to this
And I hold on to this
Or did they take em down
Build towers and let them fall
I create something i can mess up
Wrong the right on the last call
Blow up all i gathered around me
Let go of the air i need to breath
Cut loos of all that binds me
Yet try to plant this impotent seed
Is the sight of this all
As a part of staying sane
I don't respect what I feel
Like a dog waiting for a treat
Like a fish with a hook in it's mouth
In the maze that you built
In the haze that you made
We build a hill of lies,
Watch the polluted sun upon it
Kid ourselves with the beauty of nothingness
Yet we belong to some other place
Oblivion, where we build our dreams
Immaculate treasure of sin, we inherit
Never count the days, till the moment arrives
The day where the past hits us in the face
